snippet.title: WoM2 Storytelling | Aquamarine | We Are Back!
snippet.description:
In a world divided by kingdoms and warlords, two warriors walked separate paths destined to cross. SirNaxil, a tall and stern man from Mount Sohan, was known for his strength and battle-hardened nature. Marisole, a skilled and fiery warrior from the Yongbi Desert, was renowned for her mastery of swordsmanship and bravery. Though their worlds were different, fate brought them together under mysterious circumstances.

One winter day, Marisole ventured into the forests of Mount Sohan to investigate rumors of a dark force rising in the mountains. She had heard that a man with god-like power was gathering an army there, threatening her homeland. As she trudged through the deep snow, she encountered SirNaxil. Initially, Marisole was ready to fight, but something about him made her pause. His presence conveyed purpose, and there was no surprise in his eyes when he saw her, as if he had been expecting her.

The two warriors exchanged words, with Marisole accusing him of plotting against her kingdom. SirNaxil, however, denied the rumors, explaining that he was not an enemy but a man seeking refuge. He wished to join Marisole's empire, offering loyalty and respect in exchange for protection from the harsh cold of Mount Sohan. Although cautious, Marisole agreed to let him prove his sincerity, though she warned she would keep a close watch on him.

As they journeyed back to the desert, the two warriors grew stronger, gathering supplies and forging weapons together. Over time, SirNaxil earned Marisole's trust, and they became allies. Their partnership marked the beginning of a new bond forged in the fires of respect and mutual strength.

__________________________________________________________________________

All of the clips were shot in WoM2 server.
Story was fabricated by Marisole and SirNaxiL.
Video was made by Marisole (irl Michael Georgiou).

More videos coming soon! So stay tuned!!!

Subscribe and click the bell button to never miss a single upload!! 

Hope you enjoy!

Regards, 
    💎 Aquamarine Guild 💎
